topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ac115d6368720fd7000788#post_55ac115d6368720fd7000788
When you think about it does explain why bronies aren't the biggest thing in the universe anymore; the tv show is popular, but in comparison the fanbase isn't really as active as it used to be.  On average about half a million people still watch my little pony, but they're not nearly as interested in it to join the fandom; to them it's just a cartoon they watch.
